Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Scarab
Description: Small, cracked asymmetrical scarab. Its colouring has disappeared on its back. The head is visible but the elytra are not depicted. Hieroglyphic signs written in black are clearly visible on the flat surface.
